sentences.en: ‘Everything’s going to be all right, you’ll see.’ Jenny looked doubtful .
sentences.cn: “一切都会顺顺当当的，你等着看好了。” 珍妮看起来不大相信的样子。

sentences.en: For a time it seemed doubtful that he would move at all.
sentences.cn: 短期内他似乎不大可能搬走。

sentences.en: Forsyth is doubtful for tonight's game with a badly bruised leg.
sentences.cn: 福赛斯腿部严重擦伤，不大可能参加今晚的比赛。

sentences.en: I am very doubtful of that.
I feel doubtful what I ought to do.
I feel very doubtful about this.

sentences.cn: 该往哪里去我心中无底.

sentences.en: It is doubtful whether it is true or not.
sentences.cn: 这件事的真假是可疑的.

sentences.en: It is doubtful whether Ted, even with his fluent French, passed for one of the locals.
sentences.cn: 尽管特德能说一口流利的法语，但他是否会被当成当地人仍值得怀疑。

sentences.en: It is doubtful whether Tweed, even with his fluent French, passed for one of the locals.
sentences.cn: 尽管特威德能说一口流利的法语，他是否能被当作当地人还很难说。

sentences.en: Let's try to clear up our difficult and doubtful points.
sentences.cn: 让我们设法把难处和疑点解决一下.

sentences.en: Prospects for a lasting peace remain doubtful.
Rose was doubtful about the whole idea.
sentences.cn: 罗斯对整个设想持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: Some British banks have used doubtful property revaluations to improve their capital ratios.
sentences.cn: 有些英国银行通过使用不可靠的资产重估来提高它们的资本率。

sentences.en: They paused at the top of the stairs, doubtful as to which way to go next.
sentences.cn: 他们在楼梯顶部停住了，不知道接下来该往哪边走。
这是一场胜负难测的战争.

sentences.en: Whether the authorities will allow inspection is highly doubtful.
sentences.cn: 当局是否允许检查还是个大问号。

words.tran_cn: 无疑地；确定地；大概，多半
抱怀疑态度的人；不信宗教的人；怀疑论者

trans.tran_cn: 不大可能的，怀疑的，拿不定主意的，低劣的
trans.tran_en: probably not true or not likely to happen
